projects.title: Applications of Unsupervised Machine Learning Techniques and Clustering Analysis
description: Utilized unsupervised machine learning and clustering techniques to analyze rainfall data, leading to the identification of key trends and the creation of predictive models.

projects.title: Clothing Brand Website
description: Developed a fully responsive prototype of a clothing brand website using HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Stress Management System App
description: Developing a mobile app to assist users in managing stress through AI-driven sentiment analysis and relaxation tools.
